video.title: 5 Common Scrum Events
video.description:
Get the most out of the 5 most common Scrum events:
- Backlog refinement
- Sprint planning
- Daily Scrum
- Sprint review
- Sprint retrospective

Video by Agile Coach Chris Gagné: https://chrisgagne.com/

-

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Steve Carter
topLevelComment.text: As an experienced and somewhat sceptical by nature agilist, i want to say that I'm 6 minutes in and you're talking a lot of sense. Imo you don't need all the resume stuff at the start, let your experience shine through your material.

topLevelComment.author: Jesus Pacheco
topLevelComment.text: Loved this video, thanks for the great explanation!

topLevelComment.author: akinhwan. com
topLevelComment.text: i have studied and watched these videos, but at work we do not have this methodology. How would one suggest implementing this at a workplace?

replies.author: Steve Carter
replies.text: You go to your team lead and say "did you know about scrum? I think we should try it"

replies.author: Chris Gagné
replies.text: It's more than just a methodology. My strongest suggestion would be to hire an Agile Coach and have them work with your leadership first. You will most likely need cultural and structural changes before these processes and tools work correctly.
